Package io.zucchini.circuitsimtester.api

Contains wrapper classes which make internal CircuitSim APIs more friendly for testing, and provides annotations used to instruct CircuitSimExtension to lookup subcircuits, pins, or registers.
See Also:
The README with examples, Example tests, CircuitSim source code
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMemory
    Base class inherited by Ram and Rom.
    BasePin
    Wraps a CircuitSim Pin component.
    Button
    Allows pretending to push a button placed in a subcircuit.
    Clock
    Allows pretending to tick a Clock component placed in a subcircuit.
    InputPin
    Wraps a CircuitSim input Pin component and provides a convenience method for setting its value.
    MockPulser
    Similar to MockRegister but much simpler: manipulates an InputPin which replaced a clock or button and is used to send "pulses" into the circuit.
    MockRegister
    Represents a "ghost" register: a register component replaced with Pin components for easier testing.
    OutputPin
    Wraps a CircuitSim output Pin component and provides a convenience method for setting its value.
    Ram
    Wraps a CircuitSim RAM component.
    Register
    Wraps a CircuitSim Register component.
    Restrictor
    Validates a subcircuit by checking for issues such as banned components.
    Rom
    Wraps a CircuitSim ROM component.
    Subcircuit
    Represents and wraps the subcircuit to test.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Subcircuit.MemoryType
    Please see Subcircuit.lookupMemory(String,int,boolean,MemoryType) for details on this enum.
    Subcircuit.PulserType
    Please see Subcircuit.mockPulser(String,boolean,PulserType) for details on this enum.
    SubcircuitComponent.Type
    Please see SubcircuitComponent.type() for details on this enum.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    SubcircuitComponent
    Instructs CircuitSimExtension to find and inject a CircuitSim component into the annotated field in a test class.
    SubcircuitTest
    Marks this JUnit test class as testing a subcircuit with the provided .sim file path and subcircuit name.
